long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Misophonia Mode: Remove Lip Smack Sounds from Videos

Are you sensitive to lip smacks and other distracting mouth sounds in videos? Anti-Misophonia Mode is designed to improve your video-watching experience by detecting and reducing the volume of lip smack sounds in real-time.

Key Features:
	•	Real-Time Sound Detection: Uses advanced audio analysis to identify lip smack frequencies and mute them seamlessly while preserving the original audio quality.
	•	Custom Frequency Filtering: Targets specific sound patterns commonly associated with lip smacks, focusing on the 1800–2000 Hz and 4000–4500 Hz ranges for precise removal.
	•	Easy to Use: Toggle the filter on or off with a simple switch, so you’re always in control.
	•	Improves Accessibility: Helps individuals with misophonia and auditory sensitivities enjoy videos stress-free.

Who is it for?
	•	Individuals with misophonia who experience discomfort from lip smacks or mouth noises.
	•	Anyone looking for a cleaner, more enjoyable video-audio experience.

How It Works:
Anti-Misophonia Mode leverages advanced audio processing to analyze video soundtracks in real-time. It isolates and reduces unwanted lip smack sounds without affecting the rest of the audio, ensuring a smooth and natural listening experience.
